name: Chamonix
fun_fact: Fun fact: Chamonix hosted the first-ever Winter Olympics in 1924, and Mont Blanc (4,808m) on its doorstep is Western Europe's highest peak - climbers have been attempting the summit since 1786, with a 100-person daily limit today!
